name: Socksite
body:
### Welcome to SockSite
This is the website that powers Is It Just Me or Is It Server Cooties?, which can be found at servercooties.com

### Known Mirrors
- Servercooties.com
- isitjusmeorservercooties.com
- isitjustmeorservercooties.com
- isitjustmeorservercooti.es

### Contributing
We generally use the following branch system for contributing:
- For *development*, use a local fork. You can quickly launch a dev server using Vagrant from the root of the project
- Submit your pull request against socksite/testing, so it can be integrated with other in-flight changes in our *demo* environment
- When it's all good, it'll be pushed to master and deployed! 

### Authors and Contributors
- @Onyx47 is our front-end designer
- @AccaliaDeElementia is our backend designer
- @Yamikuronue and @RaceProUK are in charge of silly add-ons. 

### Support
For support, see http://what.thedailywtf.com/t/isitjustmeorservercooties-com-development-thread-and-onyx-notification-spam/37172
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
